name: Daily-Global-Sudoku
pageContent: A Sudoku game that updates daily with a new puzzle automatically using a server and a MongoDB database, deployed using Heroku. The game is built using React and styled using MUI. The game has a leaderboard to compare scores with friends and more

name: ReactJack
pageContent: A JavaScript port of the classic card game blackjack, built using the React framework and Material UI.

name: JShutTheBox
pageContent: A simple javascript port of the classic game Shut The Box, made with materialUI and React.

name: SQLStore
pageContent: A simplestorefront backend made with Sequelize/MySql, Express and NodeJS. No front end, just a REST API.

name: Rouletteo
pageContent: Just input a .xlsx file and we'll pick a random row for you. Made with React and MaterialUI.
